title: idea
subTitle: Research & Design
desc: Everything start with an idea, a vision. By going trough research and designs, I will make sure you have a website that is user friendly, safe and exceeds expectations.

title: development & testing
subTitle: Building the product
desc: After going trough step 1 of designing, development can begin, making the front-end, creating the back-end, and bringing those visions, ideas, and design to reality.

title: enjoy
subTitle: Deployment
desc: After the website is build, its time to deploy, quickly work out possible kinks or bugs that passed previous testing, and see all the hard work pay off by seeing the product up and running.
